title: i want to main swain
body:
So i'm thinking about starting to main swain {{champion:50}}  but i'm not sure what items to build first.

I've only played 3 games as him and won 2 but i'm still not sure which build is best for him and whether or not i should buy boots first and what boots should i build in to. Any tips on how to play him mid lane would be helpful.

replies.body:
The most important thing you need to know and do when it comes to playing Swain is the following.

This must be playing repeatedly for the entirety of the game. This ensures you a free win with 100% success rate.

https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=9Gc4QTqslN4

Rush catalyst asap. Finish ROA when you can. 
For boots, for the most part you'll want sorcerers. If they have lots of cc go for mercy treads. If it's a tough lane and/or you expect to roam a bit, I don't mind the speedy ones. 
A lot of people have the misconception that swain must have spirit Visage for extra healing. This is bullocks. If you need the MR go for an abyssal. If you don't need the MR, a death cap will heal you for more than a spirit Visage unless it's changed since I played swain last. Follow up with a zhonya 

If your team is screaming for a tank, I actually enjoy getting randuins omen and guardian angel. But that's only if you have a super squishy team and you have to be the soak

If you are well fed and doing well, ROA-deathcap-rylais-liandries is funny
